show-sunrise-sunset.description: Whether to show sunrise / sunset times in current weather.

show-text-in-panel.description: Display current temperature in panel.  If disabled, only the icon is shown.

translate-condition.description: If enabled, the condition is translated based on the weather code.  Otherwise the string from Yahoo is taken.

use-symbolic-icons.description: Display symbolic icons instead of full-colored icons

show-comment-in-panel.description: Whether to show the weather condition (e.g., "Windy", "Clear") in the panel.

location-label-override.description: Sometimes your WOEID location isn't quite right (it's the next major city around).  This label is used to override the location displayed.
